m_szDocSumamry: Roof Racks are Wasting Your Gas Americans buy an extra 100 million gallons of gas every year because of them. Gear Up Getty Images Roof racks reduce gas mileage. Everyone knows that. However, we never knew exactly how much extra gas Americans slurp up annually because of roof racks. According to two researchers at Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory and the National Renewable Energy Laboratory, now we do: 100 million gallons in 2015.
